type.name: emoji
type.description: use an emoji presentation for emoji characters if possible

type.name: text
type.description: use a text presentation for emoji characters if possible

type.name: default
type.description: use the default presentation as specified in UTR #51

key.name: rg
key.description: Alternate region for determining certain data values (e.g. default currency and units) specified by rgScope

type.name: RG_KEY_VALUE
type.description: A region code from idValidity/id[type='region'][idStatus='regular'], suffixed with 'ZZZZ'

type.name: SUBDIVISION_CODE
type.description: Valid unicode_subdivision_subtag for the region subtag as specified in LDML, based on subdivisionContainment data in supplementalData, prefixed by the associated unicode_region_subtag
